snippet: China has moved to expand friendly cultural exchanges with the United States and promote a series of prominent collaborations in music, dance and education, particularly in New York.
abstract: Chinese government is using the 35th anniversary of diplomatic relations with the United States as part of an intensified effort to soften its image by expanding friendly culture exchanges with the US; effort comes as tensions between the two countries have been growing over a range of political and economic issues.
lead_paragraph: China has moved to expand friendly cultural exchanges with the United States and promote a series of prominent collaborations in music, dance and education, particularly in New York.

headline.main: On 35th Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties With U.S., China Tries to Soften Image
headline.print_headline: On 35th Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties With U.S., China Tries to Soften Image
